mapper.insert: insert into review(rtitle, star, review, rimage1, rimage2, uid, pno, bno) values(#{rtitle}, #{star}, #{review}, #{rimage1}, #{rimage2}, #{uid}, #{pno}, #{bno})
mapper.select: select r.*, p.pname, p.pimage from review r, shopproduct p where r.pno=p.pno order by rdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
